group.Description: Group within the project the participant belongs to

rct.Description: which RCT condition are they in. Only applicable to patient sample. Non-autistic control should coded as NA

fmri.Description: whether a participant completed the fMRI session [details of fMRI taskl]

nback.Description: whether a participant completed the nback mind wandering behavioural task (with or without ECG measurement)

nbackECG.Description: whether a participant completed the nback mind wandering behavioural task (with ECG measurement)

slowdot.Description: whether a participant completed the slow dot mind wandering fMRI task

mrimwq.Description: whether a participant completed the modified York mind wandering questionnaire after a scanning session

HBT.Description: whether a participant completed the heart-beat tracking task in the session

TT.Description: whether a participant completed the control time tracking task in the session

HBD.Description: whether a participant completed the control time discrimination task in the session

prosody.Description: whether a participant completed the prosody task in the session

multiinterval.Description: whether a participant completed the multi interval task in the session

BPQ.Description: whether participant completed Body Perception Questionnaire

TAS_total.Description: whether participant completed Toronto Alexithymia Scale - Total Score

TAS_DDF.Description: whether participant completed Toronto Alexithymia Scale - Difficulty Describing Feelings

TAS_DIF.Description: whether participant completed Toronto Alexithymia Scale - Difficulty Identifying Feelings

TAS_EOT.Description: whether participant completed Toronto Alexithymia Scale - Externally-Oriented Thinking

STAI_S.Description: whether participant completed Spielberger State Anxiety

STAI_T.Description: whether participant completed Spielberger Trait Anxiety

GAD-7.Description: whether participant completed General Anxiety Disorder

PANAS_positive.Description: whether participant completed Positive and Negative Affect Scale_pos

PANAS_negative.Description: whether participant completed Positive and Negative Affect Scale_neg

PHQ9.Description: whether participant completed Patient Health Questionnaire - Depression

UCLA_LS.Description: whether participant completed UCLA Loneliness Scale

UCLA_upset.Description: whether participant completed UCLA Loneliness Distress - added questions

GSQ_TOTAL.Description: whether participant completed Glasgow Sensory Questionnaire - Total

GSQ_Hyper.Description: whether participant completed Glasgow Sensory Questionnaire - Hypersensitivity

GSQ_Hypo.Description: whether participant completed Glasgow Sensory Questionnaire - Hyposensitivity
